sample.title: Remoting Async Delegate Sample
sample.overview: This sample shows how to make asynchronous calls using remoting. Both samples in this directory use BeginInvoke and EndInvoke to make asynchronous calls and retrieve the results from the call.

buildsteps.step:
Type nmake -a all from the command line.
C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\v1.1\Samples\Technologies\Remoting\Advanced\AsyncDelegate> nmake -a all

runsteps.step: Run the executables AsyncDelegate.exe and AsyncDelegate2.exe from a console window.
